Title: Nowhere to Go
Plot: A mishap with baby Katie and a bag of Es leads to a standoff between Mandy and Frank. When the family back Mandy, Frank is forced to leave the house and ends up sleeping rough.  Meanwhile, when Liam learns he's going to be nappy changing for Monica's new baby, he decides to run away. He catches up with Frank and the two outcasts bond over a camp fire and a leaky tent. Micky's attempts to get into his dad's good books go horribly wrong when he accidentally loses the weekly drug pick-up distracted
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Sally Carman, Adam Beresford, Karl Lucas [I], Lee Lomas, Colin David Jackson
